cmp: 丰 (buxom/good-looking/appearance and carriage of a person, (surname)/abundant/plentiful/great)
巴 ((suff. for certain nouns)/to hope/to wish/Palestinian, Palestine (abbrev.)/Pakistan (abbrev.)/Pascal (unit of pressure))
mng: colorful, splendid, gaudy, amorous, romantic, to envy

exm.mng: favorable opportunity for an encounter with a beautiful woman, also written 艷遇|艳遇

vying to be the most glamorous, each more gorgeous than the other, beauty contest
